title: Finacely
description: Financely is a financial management app for tracking, categorizing, sorting, searching, and importing/exporting transactions with real-time updates.

title: Blog App
description: BLog-It is a platform for users to create, edit, and manage posts with images, comment on posts, and securely authenticate for a personalized experience.

title: Chatbot AI
description: Gemini Pro Chatbot AI is an interactive AI-powered chatbot that engages users in conversations, provides responses, and enhances user interaction with a seamless chat experience.

title: CodePen
description: CodePen Clone is an interactive platform for writing, editing, and previewing code in real time.

title: Pomodoro
description: Built a Pomodoro Timer to manage work and break intervals with customizable sessions and progress tracking.
